PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-11012000-07-270,  ,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
PrecisEnactment of an EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER to facilitate the appointment of women in the Edmonton Institution for Women by excluding the positions from the subsection of the Act which prohibits discrimination in the selection by reason of sex, for the period from September 1, 2000 to December 31, 2001.
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 2000-0064 Publication Date: 2000-08-16
